name: Paul Nabor
description: '''Paul Nabor''' (26 January 1928 â€“ 22 October 2014), born '''Alfonso Palacio''', was a [[Garifuna people|Garifuna]] singer and musician from [[Punta Gorda, Belize|Punta Gorda]], [[Belize]]. He is often credited with popularizing [[Paranda (music)|paranda]], a style of traditional [[Garifuna music]], and is considered to have been one of the most talented musicians of the genre.
